price: 29 Ceux qui récitent le Livre d’Allah, qui accomplissent la prière et qui, discrètement ou publiquement, offrent par charité une partie de ce qu’Il leur a accordé, peuvent espérer des gains impérissables
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتۡلُونَ كِتَٰبَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ سِرّٗا وَعَلَانِيَةٗ يَرۡجُونَ تِجَٰرَةٗ لَّن تَبُورَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yatlūna kitāba al-lahi wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-anfaqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirran waʿalāniyatan yarjūna tijāratan lan tabūra
